options.content:
# Useful Information
[IDCEvo Wiki: Add new elements into Grafana](https://asc.bmwgroup.net/wiki/display/IDCEVO/4.12%29+Add+new+elements+into+Grafana)\
[Grafana Documentation](https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/panels-visualizations/)

# [RESET Dashboard vars](https://mgu-gen22-si-metrics.bmwgroup.net/grafana/d/jifewijfwpoe/idcevo-android-ui-performance?orgId=1)
You probably need to refresh the page after click here

panels.description: Heatmap for time that took to render frames, above 50 ms. Heatmaps are separated for easier comprehension.
panels.title: Frame render times heatmap (above 50ms)

panels.description: Measures taken from "gfxinfo", showing total rendered frames, janky frames, and janky frames (legacy)

targets.query: SELECT total_frames FROM "frames_statistics" WHERE ("build" =~ /^$build_id$/) AND ("hardware_revision" =~ /^$hardware_revision$/) AND ("job" =~ /^$job_name$/)

panels.title: Total Rendered Frames and Janky Frames

panels.description: Calculated frame render time average, using the values from render time histogram
panels.title: Frame render times average

panels.description: Heatmap for time that took to render frames, below 50 ms. Heatmaps are separated for easier comprehension.
panels.title: Frame render times heatmap (below 50ms)

panels.description: Measures taken from "gfxinfo", showing frame render time percentiles
panels.title: Frame render time percentiles

options.content:
##### Frame time statistics for a stable, non-BMW application called "Now in Android" that displays Android news.
##### Since the application is installed with an APK, its version remains consistent and utilizes the same data, allowing performance comparisons across different IDCevo builds.
##### [Example benchmark video]( https://jira.cc.bmwgroup.net/secure/attachment/6044097/6044097_nowinandroid_performance_test.mp4)

panels.description: Heatmap for time that took to render frames, above 50 ms. Heatmaps are separated for easier comprehension.
panels.title: Frame render times heatmap (above 50ms)

panels.description: Measures taken from "gfxinfo", showing total rendered frames, janky frames, and janky frames (legacy)

targets.query: SELECT total_frames FROM "nowinandroid_statistics" WHERE ("build" =~ /^$build_id$/) AND ("hardware_revision" =~ /^$hardware_revision$/) AND ("job" =~ /^$job_name$/)

list.definition: select build from job_duration where ("job" =~ /^$job_name$/) AND $timeFilter
list.label: build_id
list.name: build_id
list.query: select build from job_duration where ("job" =~ /^$job_name$/) AND $timeFilter

list.definition: show tag values from job_duration with key = hardware_revision WHERE ("job" =~ /^$job_name$/) AND $timeFilter
list.label: hardware_revision
list.name: hardware_revision
